================
About tt.eggdeps
================

:Fork Maintainer:
    `Gary Reynolds <gary@touch.asn.au>`_

:Original Author:
    `Thomas Lotze <http://thomas-lotze.de/>`_ <thomas@thomas-lotze.de>

:Web home:
    http://thomas-lotze.de/en/software/eggdeps/

:Online documentation:
    https://github.com/goodtune/tt.eggdeps

:PyPI page:
    http://pypi.python.org/pypi/tt.eggdeps/

:Git home:
    git@github.com:goodtune/tt.eggdeps.git

:Git web view:
    https://github.com/goodtune/tt.eggdeps

:Current change log:
    https://svn.thomas-lotze.de/repos/public/tl.eggdeps/trunk/CHANGES.txt
